org.dataconservancy.packaging.tool.api

Interface OpenPackageService

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    OpenPackageServiceImpl

    public interface OpenPackageService
    A service to open a package at various points in its life-cycle. The package tree which is returned along with the package state is modified as needed so that the nodes refer to files in the opened package.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      OpenedPackage openExplodedPackage(File dir)
      Open a serialized package which has been uncompressed to a directory.
      OpenedPackage openPackage(File staging_dir, File file)
      Open a serialized package in a staging directory.
      OpenedPackage openPackageState(File file)
      Open the package state of an package in the process of being created.

    • Method Detail

      • openPackageState

        OpenedPackage openPackageState(File file)
                        throws IOException
        Open the package state of an package in the process of being created.
        Parameters:
        file - Package state file
        Returns:
        Opened package with base directory set to null.
        Throws:
        IOException - if we cannot open the file

      • openPackage

        OpenedPackage openPackage(File staging_dir,
                          File file)
                   throws IOException
        Open a serialized package in a staging directory.
        Parameters:
        staging_dir - Directory to uncompress the package.
        file - Serialized package.
        Returns:
        Opened package.
        Throws:
        IOException - if we cannot open the serialized package file

        Open a serialized package which has been uncompressed to a directory.

        Returns:
